Description: Flat disc made of a greyish-brownish clay with roughly rectangular edges but slightly rounded. A hole in the centre that was perforated from one side. The surface is slightly uneven, finger traces from forming the object. The surface is eroded, partly chipped off. In the perforation salt crystal accretions. The perforation has a diameter of 1.8-1.9 cm. Could have been used as a weight.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), D14 (Street near D14.15)
